[00:00.00]I've Been Waiting (Explicit) - Lil Peep/iLoveMakonnen/Fall Out Boy (打倒男孩)
[00:00.15]Lyrics by：Gustav Åhr/Valentin Leon Blavatnik/Louis Bell/Makonnen Sheran/Brian Lee/Brenton Duvall/Patrick Stump/Peter Wentz/Joseph Trohman/Andrew Hurley
[00:00.31]Composed by：Gustav Åhr/Valentin Leon Blavatnik/Louis Bell/Makonnen Sheran/Brian Lee/Brenton Duvall/Patrick Stump/Peter Wentz/Joseph Trohman/Andrew Hurley
[00:00.47]Produced by：ILoveMakonnen/Louis Bell/Brian Lee/Brenton Duvall/IIVI
[00:00.63]Lil Peep：
[00:02.59]Woah yeah
[00:07.33]iLoveMakonnen/Lil Peep：
[00:07.79]I've been waiting
[00:09.35]I've been waiting
[00:10.44]I've been waiting up
[00:12.02]'Cause I can't get enough oh
[00:14.93]I feel I'm fading
[00:16.69]Yeah
[00:17.79]When I fall apart
[00:19.46]Your needle starts my heart oh
[00:22.07]iLoveMakonnen：
[00:22.36]F**k me up and make me just go crazy
[00:25.89]Addicted to the pain that you just made me love
[00:29.69]I'm dreamin' for your touchin' on the daily
[00:33.43]You're the only one that I want
[00:35.83]Lil Peep：
[00:37.25]Break my heart but don't tell me I'm not doin' fine
[00:42.16]'Cause I'll do it fine
[00:44.60]Let me go I'm spendin' time
[00:47.79]Not doin' fine but I'll do it fine
[00:50.92]iLoveMakonnen：
[00:51.10]Why you actin' vain for my love vain for my love
[00:55.43]When you got everything that I want
[00:58.29]Why you actin' vain for my blood vain for my blood
[01:02.82]When you got everything that I want
[01:05.66]Why you actin'
[01:06.50]Patrick Stump：
[01:06.86]I been dreamin'
[01:09.55]Of your uniform your uniform of non-conformity
[01:13.86]The tears the tears
[01:16.93]Tears aren't strong enough the years aren't long enough no
[01:21.31]iLoveMakonnen：
[01:21.44]F**k me up and make me just go crazy
[01:24.96]Addicted to the pain that you just made me love
[01:28.83]I'm dreamin' for your touchin' on the daily
[01:32.39]You're the only one that I want
[01:34.54]Lil Peep：
[01:36.36]Break my heart but don't tell me I'm not doin' fine
[01:41.09]'Cause I'll do it fine
[01:43.70]Let me go I'm spendin' time
[01:46.81]Not doin' fine but I'll do it fine
[01:50.29]iLoveMakonnen：
[01:50.47]Why you actin' vain for my love vain for my love
[01:54.54]When you got everything that I want
[01:57.45]Why you actin' vain for my blood vain for my blood
[02:01.92]When you got everything that I want
[02:04.69]Why you actin' vain
[02:06.09]Patrick Stump：
[02:06.45]It's hard to miss you when you are always on the tip of my tongue
[02:13.63]I feel like I'm looking for somethin' somethin' that'll never come
[02:20.64]Call me when you're in the city again
[02:24.02]My head just went oblivion
[02:28.41]It's hard to miss you when you are always on the tip of my tongue
[02:33.66]Always on the tip of my tongue
[02:35.08]iLoveMakonnen/Lil Peep：
[02:35.64]And now the time is right you wanna do me so wrong
[02:39.00]Now the time is right you wanna do me so wrong
[02:42.23]When I've been waitin'
[02:44.63]I've been waitin'
[02:45.49]Long for you
[02:47.93]Long for you
[02:48.94]Lil Peep：
[02:49.38]I wanna drink my wine I wanna pass that by
[02:53.22]I wanna make her cry she wanna make me die
[02:57.52]Apple pie six cigarettes
[03:00.70]And I'll cast a vibe that we can't forget
[03:03.94]iLoveMakonnen/Patrick Stump：
[03:04.04]Why you actin' vain for my love vain for my love

[03:11.24]Why you actin' vain for my blood vain for my blood

[03:34.46]I'll be waiting
[03:36.34]I'll be waiting
[03:39.50]For you
[03:41.58]And now the time is right you wanna do me so wrong
[03:45.45]And now the time is right you wanna do me so wrong
[03:47.67]I'll be waiting for you

[ti:I've Been Waiting (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Peep/iLoveMakonnen/Fall Out Boy]
[al:I've Been Waiting (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.15]//
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.47]//
[00:00.63]//
[00:02.59]//
[00:07.33]//
[00:07.79]我一直在等待
[00:09.35]我一直在等待
[00:10.44]我一直在等待
[00:12.02]因为我贪得无厌
[00:14.93]我感觉自己越来越虚弱
[00:16.69]//
[00:17.79]当我行将崩溃时
[00:19.46]你的鼓舞会让我的心重新跳动
[00:22.07]//
[00:22.36]让我心碎 让我疯狂
[00:25.89]我沉迷悲伤 不能自拔
[00:29.69]每天都梦见你温柔的抚摸
[00:33.43]我想要的只有你
[00:35.83]//
[00:37.25]我心碎不堪 但别说我萎靡不振
[00:42.16]因为我终究会振作起来
[00:44.60]别管我 给我点时间
[00:47.79]精神不太好 但我会没事的
[00:50.92]//
[00:51.10]为何你要无视我的爱 无视我的爱
[00:55.43]你明明拥有我要的一切
[00:58.29]为何你要无视我的心血 无视我的心血
[01:02.82]你明明拥有我要的一切
[01:05.66]为何你要
[01:06.50]//
[01:06.86]我总是梦见
[01:09.55]你心口不一 自相矛盾的样子
[01:13.86]眼泪 眼泪
[01:16.93]眼泪夺眶而出 时间迅速流逝
[01:21.31]//
[01:21.44]让我心碎 让我疯狂
[01:24.96]我沉迷悲伤 不能自拔
[01:28.83]每天都梦见你温柔的抚摸
[01:32.39]我想要的只有你
[01:34.54]//
[01:36.36]我心碎不堪 但别说我萎靡不振
[01:41.09]因为我终究会振作起来
[01:43.70]别管我 给我点时间
[01:46.81]精神不太好 但我会没事的
[01:50.29]//
[01:50.47]为何你要无视我的爱 无视我的爱
[01:54.54]你明明拥有我要的一切
[01:57.45]为何你要无视我的心血 无视我的心血
[02:01.92]你明明拥有我要的一切
[02:04.69]为何你要无视
[02:06.09]//
[02:06.45]总把你挂在嘴边 我就不会那么想念你
[02:13.63]我仿佛在寻找不存在的东西
[02:20.64]若你回到这个城市 给我打电话
[02:24.02]我的头脑已经一片空白
[02:28.41]总把你挂在嘴边 我就不会那么想念你
[02:33.66]总把你挂在嘴边
[02:35.08]//
[02:35.64]此刻如此美好 你却只想伤害我
[02:39.00]此刻如此美好 你却只想伤害我
[02:42.23]我一直在等待
[02:44.63]我一直在等待
[02:45.49]等了你好久
[02:47.93]等了你好久
[02:48.94]//
[02:49.38]我想借酒浇愁 忘记过去
[02:53.22]我想让她伤心 她想让我死去
[02:57.52]苹果派 六支烟
[03:00.70]我会营造一种永生难忘的氛围
[03:03.94]//
[03:04.04]为何你要无视我的爱 无视我的爱
[03:08.32]你明明拥有我要的一切
[03:11.24]为何你要无视我的心血 无视我的心血
[03:15.66]你明明拥有我要的一切
[03:18.52]为何你要无视
[03:19.82]//

[03:27.40]我仿佛在寻找不存在的东西
[03:33.17]//
[03:34.46]我会等待
[03:36.34]我会等待
[03:39.50]等待你
[03:41.58]此刻如此美好 你却只想伤害我
[03:45.45]此刻如此美好 你却只想伤害我
